Package ohos.utils

Class IntentConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.utils.IntentConstants

  • public final class IntentConstants
extends Object
    Defines the Intent-related constants used in the system, including the actions, entities, and flags contained in the intents passed to methods for starting an ability.

    In the description below, a Page, Service, or Data ability indicates an ability using the respective template, whereas the ability alone indicates an ability using any type of templates.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ACTION_APPLICATION_DETAILS_SETTINGS
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability that displays details of a specified application.
      static String ACTION_CHOOSE
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for opening contacts or pictures.
      static String ACTION_DIAL
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability that displays a keypad.
      static String ACTION_DISMISS_ALARM
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for deleting an alarm clock.
      static String ACTION_DISMISS_TIMER
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for dismissing a timer.
      static String ACTION_EDIT_DATA
      Indicates the action of editing data.
      static String ACTION_HIDISK_CHOOSE
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for opening hidisk.
      static String ACTION_HIDISK_CHOOSE_PATH
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for opening hidisk by path.
      static String ACTION_HOME
      the definition of home action
      static String ACTION_MANAGE_APPLICATIONS_SETTINGS
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability that manages installed applications.
      static String ACTION_SCAN_MEDIA_FILE
      Indicates the action of requesting the media scanner to scan files and adding the files to the media library.
      static String ACTION_SEARCH
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for search.
      static String ACTION_SELECT
      Indicates the action of showing the application selection dialog box.
      static String ACTION_SEND_DATA
      Indicates the action of sending a single data record.
      static String ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE_DATA
      Indicates the action of sending multiple data records.
      static String ACTION_SEND_SMS
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for sending a sms.
      static String ACTION_SET_ALARM
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for setting an alarm clock.
      static String ACTION_SHOW_ALARMS
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability that displays all alarm clocks.
      static String ACTION_SNOOZE_ALARM
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability for snoozing an alarm clock.
      static String ACTION_VIEW_DATA
      Indicates the action of viewing data.
      static String ACTION_WIRELESS_SETTINGS
      Indicates the action of starting a Page ability that provides wireless network settings, for example, Wi-Fi options.
      static String ENTITY_BROWSABLE
      Indicates the browser category.
      static String ENTITY_DEFAULT
      Indicates the default entity, which is used if the entity is not specified.
      static String ENTITY_HOME
      Indicates the home screen entity.
      static String ENTITY_VOICE
      Indicates the voice interaction entity.
      static String INTENT_PARAMS_INTENT
      Indicates the choices you will show with #ACTION_PICKER.
      static String INTENT_PARAMS_TITLE
      Indicates the CharSequence dialog title when used with a #ACTION_PICKER.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_APPLICATION_DETAILS_SETTINGS

        public static final String ACTION_APPLICATION_DETAILS_SETTINGS
        Indicates the action of starting a Page ability that displays details of a specified application.

        You must specify the application bundle name in the package attribute of the Intent containing this action.

        Since:
        3
